entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @RefuseFascism It’s obscene that Trump gives COVID19 tests as a *favor* to privileged oil execs who visited him at WH, but refuses to distribute enough test kits to the rest of us. We’ve got to let him know that his selfish priorities r killing people. If this is a war, Trump is a war criminal.
